attributes.action: Freedom of speech has limits: freedom to insult, if likely to result in violence towards people and property, must be limited.
attributes.additional_details:
Freedom of speech has limits: freedom to insult, if likely to result in violence towards people and property, must be limited.

Please give Muslims and other faith groups the same legal protection from ridicule and hate speech as Jewish and BME groups.

Please make it a criminal offence to insult any Prophet sent by God including Abraham, Moses, Jesus and Muhammad, peace be on them.
